name: Quixom Technology
description:
Quixom Technology is a software products and services company founded in early 2014. We help organizations build their software products and take them from Ideation stage to production. 
Key Verticals:
- Web Application Development
- Android and IOS mobile application development
- Embedded Devices Firmware Development
- Internet of things
- Product Testing
